title: Integrating Science and Emotional Experience: Developing Reflective Pedagogy for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic science education theories and experience in teaching mathematics curricula
context.additional_context: A pre-service teacher program integrating affective experiential elements of science education with mathematics subject pedagogy

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain the impact of learners' emotional states on science learning through three or more types of interactions
Participants can propose methods for integrating emotional elements into their instructional design through reflective interviews
Learners can develop a protocol to analyze peer teachers' instructional cases by applying qualitative research methodologies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
